overall.title: Overall Pool Occupancy Heatmap
overall.description: Average occupancy rates across all recorded weeks

weeklyAverage.title: Weekly Pool Occupancy Heatmap (Average)
weeklyAverage.description: Average occupancy rates for week starting {date}
weeklyAverage.selectWeek: Select a week to view average occupancy rates

weeklyRaw.title: Weekly Pool Occupancy Heatmap (Min/Max)
weeklyRaw.description: Min/Max occupancy values for week starting {date}
weeklyRaw.selectWeek: Select a week to view min/max occupancy values

explanations.color: The color represents absolute occupancy rate compared to maximum pool capacity - darker colors indicate higher occupancy.
explanations.height: The height of the colored bar represents relative occupancy within that day - a taller bar indicates higher occupancy compared to other hours of the same day.

meta.title: Pool Occupancy Dashboard
